column2: publisher=London: The Times Literary Supplement Limited

column1: '''''The Times Literary Supplement'' 14 September 2012''' (published online on 12 September 2012) is an issue of ''[[Wikipedia:The Times Literary Supplement
column2: The Times Literary Supplement]]''. The journal includes the article "A vision of Middle-earth: Mary Fairburn â€” Tolkien illustrator" by Paul Tankard, about the artist Mary Fairburn and her illustrations inspired by [[Middle-earth]]. Fairburn corresponded with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], who considered her pictures to be "splendid".

column1: In the article, Tankard provides several quotations from formerly [[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
*"[http://www.the-tls.co.uk/tls/public/article1124297.ece An unknown vision of Middle-earth]" (online version)
